casename: Public Prosecutor v Louis Pius Gilbert
counsel: Lawrence Ang (Principal Senior State Counsel), Winston Cheng and Sia Aik Kor (Deputy Public Prosecutors) for the applicant; Zero Nalpon (Nalpon & Company) for the respondent
tags-parsed: Criminal Law/Application by Public Prosecutor under s 60 of the Supreme Court Judicature Act (Cap 322) asking for question of law of public interest to be referred to the Court of Appeal/Whether motion be allowed.
